verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ojtac in sik'lab'il, ix in a b'eyk'olej sik'lab'il.
Ojtac ayic tzin em k'ojan yet' pax yic tzin q'ue vaan. Ayocto tzojtacanel tas tzin na'a.
Ojtacxo b'ajtil tzin eq'ui yet' b'ajtil svik' vip. Ojtac pax masanil tas tzin k'ulej.
Ayic mantzac in na tas ol vala' a achxo pax Mamin, ojtacxo.
Ayachnhejek' t'a in patic vichanh, b'achanb'at a k'ab' t'a vib'anh.
Satub'tac yoch a jelanil tik, manh jab'oc snachajel vuuj, te niwan yelk'ochi, ste sat in k'ool yuj.
¿B'ajto val ol in b'at elelal t'a Espíritu? ¿B'ajto val ol in b'at elelal t'a ichanh?
Tato tzin q'uek'och t'a satcha’anh, ata' ayach eq'ui. Tato tzin em t'a yol lu'um, ay ach pax ek'ta.
Tato tzin b'at t'a yichanhb'at b'aj sjavi k'u, ma tzin b'at cajan t'a sk'axepal ha' mar b'aj tz'em k'u,
palta sk'och pax a k'ab' t'ayin ta'. Tzin a quetzchaanh yet' a wach' k'ab', tzin ik'an b'eyoc.
Tato tzin na in k'ub'ejel in b'ha t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, mato a sakil k'inal oyanoch t'a in patic tz'och k'ik'alq'uinalil,
a t'ak'walil chi' max yal-laj in sk'ub'anel t'a ichanh. Ha k’ik’ k’inal, lajan yet' sakil k'inal t'a ichanh. Malaj sq'uexanhil t'ak'walil t'a ichanh, yujto saquilq'uinalnhej masanil t'ayach.
Ha ach ton ix a b'o masanil tas t'a in nivanil tik. Ha ach ix in a b'o t'a yol sk'ool in nun.
Sval wach' lolonel t'ayach, yujto satub'tac tas tza b'o'o. Sat in k'ol in naani, palta vojtac sik'lab'il to icha chi' yaji.
Ayic ix q'uib' in nivanil tik t'a yol sk'ol in nun, wach'chom manh chequeloc, palta manh k'ub'eltacoc yaj t'a yol a sat.
Ha ach ix il in nivanil tik ayic manto in aljilaj. Masanil sb'isul sk'ual in q'uinal, tz'ib'ab'il t'a yol a libro ayic mantalaj junok k'ual svila'.
Ach in Diosal, max nachajel-laj vuuj tas yaj a pensar t'ayin. Manhxo b'ischajb'enoc a pensar chi'.
Tato tzin och ijan in b'isani, ek'to sb'isul t'a yichanh q'uen arena. Ayic tz'el in vayanh, ayinnhej ek' t'a ichanh.
Ach in Diosal, iq'uel sq'uinal eb' sk'ulan chukal. Najat tzik'canel eb' mak'umcham anima t'a in tz'ey.
Yujto chuk tas syal eb', tzach yalub'tanhej eb' t'a chukal.
Mamin Jehová, tzin chac eb' tzach chacani, max in nib'ejlaj eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach.
Junelnhej malaj in gana svil eb', aypaxoch eb' ajk'olal t'ayin valani.
Ach in Diosal, b'eytzitej tas vaji, il pax in pensar.
Ila' tato van in b'at t'a chukal b'eyb'al, tzin a cuchb'anb'at t'a sb'eal q'uinal to aynhej t'a masanil tiempo.
